changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.rule_notification_subject ( id int8 NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY( INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 START 1 CACHE 1 NO CYCLE), rule_id int8 NULL, is_all_child bool NOT NULL DEFAULT false, is_all_descendant bool NULL DEFAULT false, subject_id varchar NULL, organization_id int8 NULL, CONSTRAINT rule_notification_subject_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT rule_notification_subject_un UNIQUE (rule_id, subject_id, organization_id) );

changeSet.author: M_Zhivotovskiy
changeSet.sql: COMMENT ON COLUMN public.rule_notification_subject.rule_id IS 'Правило в которое добавлен субъект'; COMMENT ON COLUMN public.rule_notification_subject.is_all_child IS 'Флаг "Включить всех детей(один уровень вниз) в правило"';
